summary.para: Get/Replace subset of a 1D/2D array. For 1D array, subset is a portion of the 1D array, specified by "Start Index" and "Length", For 2D array, subset is one row or one column of 2D array, specified by "Index of Row/Column" and "Row/Column selector".
Transpose 2D array. Rearrange 2D array a[,] with M rows N columns to b[,] with N rows M columns, where b[i,j] = a[j,i].
Chinese Simplified: 一维及二维数组的数据提取和更新，二维数组转置。

member.name: T:SeeSharpTools.JY.ArrayUtility.ArrayManipulation.IndexType
member.summary: Index type for accessing a 2D array, could be by row or by column. Chinese Simplified: 二维数组的索引方式，row为按行索引，column为按列索引。

member.name: F:SeeSharpTools.JY.ArrayUtility.ArrayManipulation.IndexType.row
member.summary: accesing one row of a 2D array.

member.name: F:SeeSharpTools.JY.ArrayUtility.ArrayManipulation.IndexType.column
member.summary: accessing one column of a 2D array.

summary.para: Copying a portion of array a[] to array b[], starting at specified startIndex, number of elements equals to length of b[].
Chinese Simplified: 将一维数组a[]中从指定起始位置起的后续元素拷贝至一维数组b[]，起始索引值由startIndex给出，元素个数由数组b的长度给出。

param.name: startIndex
param.para: index of the first element to copy.

summary.para: Copying one row or column of array a[,] to b[], the row/column to copy is specified by index of row/column.
Chinese Simplified: 将二维数组a[,]的指定行或列拷贝至一维数组b[]，行(或列)索引值由index给出，按行索引或按列索引由indexType给出。

param.name: a
param.para: Chinese Simplified: 原始二维数组。

param.name: index
param.para: index of the row or column to copy.
Chinese Simplified: 行或列索引值，从0开始。

param.name: b
param.para: output sequence containing copied row or column.
Chinese Simplified: 返回的指定行或列一维数组。

param.name: indexType
param.para: specifies whether to copy row or column, the default is by row.
Chinese Simplified: 设定获取行还是列。

summary.para: Replace a portion of b[] with all elements of array a[], starting at specified startIndex, number of elements equals to length of a[].
Chinese Simplified: 将一维数组a[]的所有元素拷贝至一维数组b[]中的指定位置，替换原有元素，起始索引值由startIndex给出。

param.name: a
param.para: Chinese Simplified: 输入一维数组。

param.name: b
param.para: input and output sequence, a portion of it will be replaced with elements in a[].
Chinese Simplified: 更新后的一维数组。

param.name: startIndex
param.para: index of the first element in b[] to be replaced.

summary.para: Replace one row or column of b[,] with all elements of array a[], the row/column to be replaced is specified by index of row/column.
Chinese Simplified: 将一维数组a[]的所有元素拷贝至二维数组b[,]中的指定行或列，替换该行或列的元素，行数(列数)由index给出，按行索引或按列索引由indexType给出。

param.name: a
param.para: Chinese Simplified: 输入一维数组。

param.name: b
param.para: input and output 2D array, one row or column of it will be replaced with elements in a[].
Chinese Simplified: 更新后的二维数组。

param.name: index
param.para: index of the row or column to copy.
Chinese Simplified: 行或列索引值，从0开始。

param.name: indexType
param.para: specifies whether to replace row or column, the default is by row.
Chinese Simplified: 设定替换行还是列。

summary.para: Rearrange 2D array a[,] with M rows N columns to b[,] with N rows M columns, where b[i,j] = a[j,i].
Chinese Simplified: 二维数组行列转置，即将N行M列的数组转换为M行N列。

param.name: a
param.para: Chinese Simplified: 原始二维数组。

param.name: b
param.para: Chinese Simplified: 转置后的二维数组。

summary.para: Add/Subtract/Mutiply all elements in a 1D/2D numeric array with a value.
Add/Subtract/Multiply two 1D numeric array with same length, element by element in sequence.
Calculate Sum/Average/RMS/Absolute value of a 1D numeric array.
Compare if two 1D numeric array are the same.
一维或二维数值数组与单一数值的加、减、乘运算。
两个等长一维数值数组之间逐个元素的加、减、乘运算。
一维数值数组的和、平均值、均方根值、绝对值的计算。
比较两个一维数组是否相同。

summary.para: Add two numeric arrays with same length, element by element in sequence. a[i] + b[i] = c[i]
Chinese Simplified: 将两个一维数组按照顺序进行数值相加。

param.name: c
param.para: output sequence containing the result of adding.
